mapper.select: SELECT res_time FROM reservation WHERE res_date = #{resDate} AND part_no = #{partNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RESERVATION(RES_NO, PART_NO, RES_DATE ,RES_RESERVENO, USER_NO ,RES_TIME, RES_DIV) VALUES (res_no_seq.nextval, #{partNo}, #{resDate}, #{resReserveno}, #{userNo}, #{resTime}, #{resDiv})
